item.title: Report E-2024050539
item.description:
Report E-2024050539

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-27T21:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-16
  • City: CHICAGO
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 3000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On May 16, 2024, two (2) 5-gallon pails of UN1993 were punctured by a forklift and released approximately five (5) gallons of product to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from HazChem Environmental (HCE) to remediate the impacted site. The crew collected the damaged pails and impacted material and containerized it in one (1) 55-gallon drum. HCE personnel utilized absorbents and hand tools to remove the product and placed all waste in one (1) additional 55-gallon drum.

item.title: Report E-2024050418
item.description:
Report E-2024050418

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-24T15:13:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-20
  • City: JOLIET
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal XJO experienced a UN1789 Aqua Balance Muriatic Acid release from a 15-gallon poly drum. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct cleanup operations. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 1-gallon of product released to a 1’ x 4’ area of the trailer floor and a 1’ x 5’ area of the concrete lot below due to a puncture caused by the pallet. Sodium bicarbonate was deployed to clean and neutralize the impacted areas. The damaged drum and cleanup debris were then containerized into a 55-gallon poly drum. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.
